Selinux Set to Enforcing\n This Is Need For Some App Safety Check

iSu Kernel Support OK.
No iSu Kernel Support!!!\nPlease flash the kernel support .zip or you may loose SU access

If you use iSu to deactivate SU and lost SU support try a reboot if you have iSu kernel support, without SU the app can\'t tell if you have reboot support in doubt check XDA thread link in About iSu… XDA support forun site
Click here to go to iSu Download folder
hey ho let\'s go play Pokemon!!!
SU ON\n\nPokemon Go Mod signing out
Lets Grab that Pikachu today
How many miles we are going today?
Don\'t you have home works to do? Ooo I see you are a grownup, grownup I see -_-
Have you??? tie your phone to the ceiling fan to try and get yours Pokemon eggs to hatch faster
Presidents and Prime Ministers are playing Pokemon Go around the world, I guess you can just say you are just practicing to be a politician -_-

Alakazam: Alakazam, Alakazam, Alakazam!
Ash: Pokedex, what Pokemon is that?!
Pokedex: -_- That is an Alakazam!
Ash: No way!
Chuck Norris won the World Series of Poker using Pokemon cards.
Chuck Noris caught all 150 Pokemon in 2.7 seconds.
How long will it be? before people start naming their kids after Pokemon
Are you? Activating and deactivating SU just to read my Jokes? Just click iSu icon below :)
iSu by bhb27
About iSu
Developer information:
This is a open source app check it on my github\ngithub.com/bhb27/isu
Version:
A simple app to deactivate SU at will and pass safety verification for some apps, today it works only on SU binary of CM base ROM\'s
XDA support forum site
Email
fglfgl27@gmail.com
GitHub
There is no email client installed on the device.
There is no web browser installed on the device.
